executeMethod.name: executeMethod
executeMethod.description:
Defines the method used to execute certain editor methods using the plugin.

The callback is the result that the method returns. It is an optional parameter. In case it is missing, the {@link Plugin#onMethodReturn window.Asc.plugin.onMethodReturn} function will be used to return the result of the method execution.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the specific method that must be executed.

params.name: params
params.description: The arguments that the method in use has (if it has any).

params.name: callback
params.description: The result that the method returns.

resizeWindow.name: resizeWindow
resizeWindow.description: Defines the method used to change the window size updating the minimum/maximum sizes. This method is used for visual modal plugins only.

params.name: width
params.description: The window width.

params.name: height
params.description: The window height.

params.name: minW
params.description: The window minimum width.

params.name: minH
params.description: The window minimum height.

params.name: maxW
params.description: The window maximum width.

params.name: maxH
params.description: The window maximum height.

callCommand.name: callCommand
callCommand.description:
Defines the method used to send the data back to the editor. It allows the plugin to send structured data that can be inserted to the resulting document file (formatted paragraphs, tables, text parts, and separate words, etc.).

The callback is the result that the command returns. It is an optional parameter. In case it is missing, the {@link Plugin#onCommandCallback window.Asc.plugin.onCommandCallback} function will be used to return the result of the command execution. ONLYOFFICE Document Builder commands can be only used to create content and insert it to the document editor (using the Api.GetDocument().InsertContent(...)). This limitation exists due to the co-editing feature in the online editors. If it is necessary to create a plugin for desktop editors to work with local files, no such limitation is applied.

This method is executed in its own context isolated from other JavaScript data. If some parameters or other data need to be passed to this method, use {@link /plugin/scope Asc.scope} object.

params.name: func
params.description: Defines the command written in JavaScript which purpose is to form structured data which can be inserted to the resulting document file (formatted paragraphs, tables, text parts, and separate words, etc.). Then the data is sent to the editors. The command must be compatible with {@link /docbuilder/basic ONLYOFFICE Document Builder} syntax.

params.name: isClose
params.description: Defines whether the plugin window must be closed after the code is executed or left open waiting for another command or action. The true value is used to close the plugin window after executing the function in the func parameter. The false value is used to execute the command and leave the window open waiting for the next command.

params.name: isCalc
params.description: Defines whether the document will be recalculated or not. The true value is used to recalculate the document after executing the function in the func parameter. The false value will not recalculate the document (use it only when your edits surely will not require document recalculation).

params.name: callback
params.description: The result that the method returns. Only the js standart types are available (any objects will be replaced with undefined).

callModule.name: callModule
callModule.description: Defines the method used to execute a remotely located script following a link.

params.name: url
params.description: The resource code URL.

params.name: callback
params.description: The result that the method returns.

params.name: isClose
params.description: Defines whether the plugin window must be closed after the code is executed or left open waiting for another action. The true value is used to close the plugin window after executing a remotely located script. The false value is used to execute the code and leave the window open waiting for the next action.

loadModule.name: loadModule
loadModule.description: Defines the method used to load a remotely located text resource.

params.name: url
params.description: The resource code URL.

params.name: callback
params.description: The result that the method returns.

createInputHelper.name: createInputHelper
createInputHelper.description: Defines the method used to create an {@link inputhelper input helper} - a window that appears and disappears when you type text. Its location is tied to the cursor.

getInputHelper.name: getInputHelper
getInputHelper.description: Defines the method used to get the {@link inputhelper InputHelper object}.

sendToPlugin.name: sendToPlugin
sendToPlugin.description: Sends a message from the modal window to the plugin.

params.name: name
params.description: The event name.

params.name: data
params.description: The event data.

init.name: init
init.description: The function called when the plugin is launched. It defines the data sent to the plugin describing what actions are to be performed and how they must be performed.

params.name: text
params.description: Defines the data parameter that depends on the {@link /plugin/config#initDataType initDataType} setting specified in the config.json file.

button.name: button
button.description: The function called when any of the plugin buttons is clicked. It defines the buttons used with the plugin and the plugin behavior when they are clicked.

params.name: buttonIndex
params.description: Defines the button index in the {@link /plugin/config#buttons buttons} array of the config.json file. If id == -1, then the plugin considers that the Close window cross button has been clicked or its operation has been somehow interrupted.

onTargetPositionChanged.name: onTargetPositionChanged
onTargetPositionChanged.description: The function called when the target position in the editor is changed.

onDocumentContentReady.name: onDocumentContentReady
onDocumentContentReady.description: The function called when the document is completely loaded.

onClick.name: onClick
onClick.description: The function called when the user clicks on the element.

params.name: isSelectionUse
params.description: Defines if the selection is used or not.

inputHelper_onSelectItem.name: inputHelper_onSelectItem
inputHelper_onSelectItem.description: The function called when the user is trying to select an item from the input helper.

params.name: item
params.description:
Defines the selected item:

  • text - the item text,
    type: string,
    example: "name";
  • id - the item index,
    type: string,
    example: "1".

onInputHelperClear.name: onInputHelperClear
onInputHelperClear.description: The function called when the user is trying to clear the text and the input helper disappears.

onInputHelperInput.name: onInputHelperInput
onInputHelperInput.description: The function called when the user is trying to input the text and the input helper appears.

params.name: data
params.description:
Defines the text which the user inputs:

  • add - defines if the text is added to the current text (true) or this is the beginning of the text (false),
    type: boolean,
    example: true;
  • text - the text which the user inputs,
    type: string,
    example: "text".

onTranslate.name: onTranslate
onTranslate.description: The function called right after the plugin startup or later in case the plugin language is changed.

onEnableMouseEvent.name: onEnableMouseEvent
onEnableMouseEvent.description: The function called to turn the mouse or touchpad events on/off.

params.name: isEnabled
params.description: Defines if the mouse or touchpad is enabled (true) or not (false).

onExternalMouseUp.name: onExternalMouseUp
onExternalMouseUp.description: The function called when the mouse button is released outside the plugin iframe.

onExternalPluginMessage.name: onExternalPluginMessage
onExternalPluginMessage.description: The function called to show the editor integrator message.

params.name: data
params.description:
Defines the editor integrator message:

  • type - the message type,
    type: string,
    example: "close";
  • text - the message text,
    type: string,
    example: "text".

onFocusContentControl.name: onFocusContentControl
onFocusContentControl.description: The function called to show which content control has been focused.

params.name: control
params.description: Defines the content control that has been focused.

onBlurContentControl.name: onBlurContentControl
onBlurContentControl.description: The function called to show which content control has been blurred.

params.name: control
params.description: Defines the content control that has been blurred.

onChangeContentControl.name: onChangeContentControl
onChangeContentControl.description: The function called to show which content control has been changed.

params.name: control
params.description: Defines the content control that has been changed.

onContextMenuShow.name: onContextMenuShow
onContextMenuShow.description: The function called when the context menu has been shown.

params.name: options
params.description: Defines the options for the current selection.

onContextMenuClick.name: onContextMenuClick
onContextMenuClick.description: The function called when the context menu item has been clicked.

params.name: id
params.description: Item ID.

onCommandCallback.name: onCommandCallback
onCommandCallback.description: The function called to return the result of the previously executed command. It can be used to return data after executing the {@link Plugin#callCommand callCommand} method.

onMethodReturn.name: onMethodReturn
onMethodReturn.description: The function called to return the result of the previously executed method. It can be used to return data after executing the {@link Plugin#executeMethod executeMethod} method.

onAddComment.name: onAddComment
onAddComment.description: The function called when a comment is added to the document with the {@link /plugin/executeMethod/text/addcomment AddComment} method.

params.name: comment
params.description: Defines the comment object containing the comment data.

onChangeCommentData.name: onChangeCommentData
onChangeCommentData.description: The function called when the specified comment is changed with the {@link /plugin/executeMethod/text/changecomment ChangeComment} method.

params.name: comment
params.description: Defines the comment object containing the comment data.

onRemoveComment.name: onRemoveComment
onRemoveComment.description: The function called when the specified comment is removed with the {@link /plugin/executeMethod/text/removecomments RemoveComments} method.

params.name: comment
params.description: Defines the comment object containing the comment data.
